trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDA404_02503_SEQ_00<tab>Hien is, if nothing else, an optimist at heart.
TEXT_STMBDA404_02503_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Hien.
TEXT_STMBDA404_02503_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Temulun.
TEXT_STMBDA404_02503_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Cirina.
TEXT_STMBDA404_02503_LYSE_000_000<tab>He's a lot more...straightforward than I expected? And he's certainly not short on confidence.

TEXT_STMBDA404_02503_LYSE_000_001<tab>But maybe that's the kind of leader Doma needs if they're going to beat these odds. And hey─we've come this far, haven't we? Who's to say we can't go even further?
TEXT_STMBDA404_02503_GOSETSU_000_005<tab>Has he truly recovered from his wounds, I wonder? I believe a match may be in order...
TEXT_STMBDA404_02503_HIEN_000_010<tab>So─you too have heard of the Naadam.
TEXT_STMBDA404_02503_HIEN_000_011<tab>"The great battle for supremacy of the Steppe.“ I learned of it during my stay with the Mol.

TEXT_STMBDA404_02503_HIEN_000_012<tab>To my knowledge no foreigners have ever participated, much less triumphed in a Naadam. But, lack of precedent notwithstanding, I should think we would have good standing to bid them march with us to Doma─should we win.
TEXT_STMBDA404_02503_GOSETSU_000_013<tab>Will they even permit us to fight, my lord? We belong to no tribe of the Steppe.
TEXT_STMBDA404_02503_HIEN_000_014<tab>We are not without options, given what Cirina has told me.
TEXT_STMBDA404_02503_HIEN_000_015<tab>You see, in accordance with the gods' wishes, her people shall participate in the coming Naadam...
TEXT_STMBDA404_02503_HIEN_000_016<tab>...And when they take the field, I mean for us to fight alongside them as fellow warriors of the Mol.
TEXT_STMBDA404_02503_HIEN_000_017<tab>But we need not discuss this at length here. Come, let us head north to Mol Iloh, where Cirina and her people have made camp for this season.
TEXT_STMBDA404_02503_LYSE_000_020<tab>Cirina came all this way by herself? She's braver than she looks.
TEXT_STMBDA404_02503_GOSETSU_000_025<tab>The beasts are never far. I saw more than a few stalking us as we walked. Truly, these lands are fraught with peril.
TEXT_STMBDA404_02503_HIEN_000_030<tab>My friends, I give you Mol Iloh!
TEXT_STMBDA404_02503_HIEN_000_031<tab>The khatun of the tribe, Temulun, resides in the largest yurt. We should go and make our introductions.
TEXT_STMBDA404_02503_LYSE_000_040<tab>It's smaller and more cozy than Reunion. And is that music I hear? It's strange...but somehow comforting...
TEXT_STMBDA404_02503_GOSETSU_000_045<tab>For all the grand promises my lord Hien has made, it would not do for us to falter now. We must earn the Mol's blessing.
TEXT_STMBDA404_02503_HIEN_000_050<tab>I am told you have a knack for making excellent first impressions, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Why don't you lead the way?
TEXT_STMBDA404_02503_CIRINA_000_055<tab>Oh, it's you. Where are your comrades? Did you find Hien?
TEXT_STMBDA404_02503_TEMULUN_000_060<tab>At last, the traveler comes...
TEXT_STMBDA404_02503_LYSE_000_070<tab>I guess we'll have to beat some strong opponents to win this Naadam...
TEXT_STMBDA404_02503_LYSE_000_071<tab>But that's good, isn't it? I mean, if they were easy to beat, they wouldn't be worth taking back to Doma, would they?
TEXT_STMBDA404_02503_GOSETSU_000_075<tab>How confident and bold in speech he has grown. More and more he reminds me of his father in his youth...
TEXT_STMBDA404_02503_HIEN_000_080<tab>Although I have spent much time with the Mol, I have yet to fully grasp the nature of the udgan and their insights.
TEXT_STMBDA404_02503_HIEN_000_081<tab>That they value the chance encounter, and the potential fortune it brings, however, is plain. Let us try not to disappoint them!
TEXT_STMBDA404_02503_TEMULUN_000_085<tab>Wheresoever you go, remember that you are not alone. Remember that you carry the fire for them, and they for you.
TEXT_STMBDA404_02503_CIRINA_000_090<tab>...Thank you all for coming, and for offering to fight with us in the Naadam. Though I still fear our chances grim, I am grateful for your assistance.
TEXT_STMBDA404_02503_CIRINA_000_091<tab>To be recognized as warriors of the Mol, there is a trial you must overcome.
TEXT_STMBDA404_02503_CIRINA_000_092<tab>But before we speak of such things, there is another, more pressing matter!
